briefTitle: A Study of UX003 Recombinant Human Beta-Glucuronidase (rhGUS) Enzyme Replacement Therapy in Subjects With Mucopolysaccharidosis Type 7, Sly Syndrome (MPS 7)
officialTitle: A Long-Term Open-Label Treatment and Extension Study of UX003 rhGUS Enzyme Replacement Therapy in Subjects With MPS 7
summary: The primary objective of the study is to evaluate the long-term safety of UX003 in subjects with MPS 7.

primaryOutcome.measure: Number of Participants With Treatment Emergent Adverse Events (TEAEs), Serious TEAEs, and TEAEs Leading to Discontinuation
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: From first dose of study drug until 30 days after the last dose of study drug. Mean duration of UX003 treatment was 100.5 weeks.
